description:
As reported in:

#972034 -1 vs. None w/ Unlimited Quotas

Quotas should not accept negative numbers other than -1 (which is a flag value for unlimited).
title: quotas shouldn't accept negative numbers other than (-1)

    Add validation on quota limits (negative numbers).
    
    Quotas should not accept negative numbers other than -1.
    
    Fixes LP Bug #973034.
